updates.title: VAICOM PRO Community Edition for DCS World
updates.releasenotes: Release 3.0.0.0 - Fix errors in keywords and add many more standard keyword phrases, Add new DCS Ground Crew, Wingman and Flight commands,  Provides support for Whisper Attack users by providing a clean VSPX.vap file for use, Fix the Export.cs routine to allow clean export, Change PTT Tab indication when ‘No Module Detected’, Add F-5E Flaming Cliffs version to modules (WIP), Add Community Mod F/A-18 E/F Super Hornet and E/A-18G Growler as supported modules, Add Afghanistan and Iraq theaters to ATO kneeboard time zones, Add the Afghanistan Chatter theme.
